Headline: Forest Park Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Pulaski. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
